item.title: BCA Research
item.description:
The BCA Research app puts our market-leading investment research directly in your hands, helping you to make more informed decisions, faster than ever.

FEATURES
- Get our latest research instantly on your phone
- Create your own personalized feed
- Listen to Podcasts & Reports
- Watch Webcasts & BCA Live & Unfiltered
- Save content to read later
- Read reports in light or dark mode

item.title: blu by BCA Digital
item.description:
blu Siap Jadi Pegangan Finansialmu!
 
blu menjawab kebutuhan finansial kamu dengan cara baru agar kamu bisa wujudkan apa pun yang kamu tuju. blu adalah aplikasi mobile banking dari BCA Digital, anak perusahaan BCA
 
blu punya layanan seamless yang bisa bikin kamu tenang dengan:
• Koneksi ke sistem BCA
• Sistem keamanan transaksi menggunakan PIN, Password, CVC, dan biometrik.
• Customer care haloblu yang selalu ada buat kamu
 
Ada Untukmu, Apa Pun Tujuanmu
 
Pengen nabung buat sepatu baru? Gadget baru? Rumah? Mobil? Sekolah? Apa pun tujuanmu, we’ve got your back! blu punya akses layanan perbankan digital yang mudah dengan pengalaman yang seru. Kamu bisa:
 
• Punya 20 tabungan dalam 1 rekening
• Patungan online bisa sampai 50 orang
• Buka deposito mulai dari Rp 1 juta, pencairan sebelum jatuh tempo gak kena penalti
• Bayar/beli dalam satu aplikasi
• Bayar pakai QRIS
• bluVirtual Card dan bluDebit Card yang terkoneksi dengan Mastercard, memudahkan transaksimu di dalam maupun luar negeri.
• Tarik dan Setor Tunai di ATM BCA
• Investasi di bluInvest bekerjasama dengan partner terpercaya
 
 
Eits, belum selesai! Pakai blu bebas biaya admin bulanan, bebas biaya transfer via BI-FAST dari dan ke BCA unlimited,
 
So...tunggu apa lagi? Download blu sekarang!
 
Perlu bantuan? Haloblu siap bantu kamu 24/7 via telepon 1500 668/ WhatsApp 0811-6500-668
 
PT Bank Digital BCA
Menara blu, The City Tower Lantai 11 Jl. M.H. Thamrin No.81, Menteng, 10310, Jakarta, Indonesia 10310
https://www.blubybcadigital.id/
item.update_notes:
Tenang bertransaksi, senang sampai destinasi pakai Garuda x bluDebit Card, kartu debit terbaru kolaborasi blu dan Garuda Indonesia di versi 1.59.20 
Request Garuda x bluDebit Card dan dapatkan benefit:
Welcome bonus aktivasi kartu 600 GarudaMiles & welcome bonus transaksi hingga 5.000 GarudaMiles
GarudaMiles tiap transaksi pembelian pakai Garuda x bluDebit Card

item.title: BCA Finance
item.description:
BCAF App, aplikasi financial di tangan Anda.
Layanan financial terpercaya, kapan saja dan dimana saja.

Manfaat BCAF App :
1.Dapatkan info update promosi, suku bunga dan produk-produk dari BCAF lebih cepat.
2.Ajukan kredit mobil dan pantau prosesnya tanpa harus keluar rumah.
3.Layanan konsumen sesuai kebutuhan Anda, seperti informasi pelanggan, simulasi pelunasan dipercepat, reservasi pengambilan BPKB tanpa harus antri terlebih dahulu.
4.Terhubung langsung dengan layanan digital BCAF lainnya, seperti Website BCAF, HaloBCA Chat, Astari dan Instagram BCAF.

Semuanya hanya dalam genggaman tangan Anda.

Fitur-fitur BCAF App :
1.Simulasi kredit mobil baru dan bekas berdasarkan budget total pembayaran pertama ataupun angsuran.
2.Pengajuan kredit online.
3.Tracking status pengajuan kredit online.
4.Layanan konsumen :
a.Info Pelanggan (informasi angsuran dan histori pembayaran).
b.Simulasi early termination / pelunasan dipercepat.
c.Booking Pengambilan BPKB.
5.E-Doc.

Untuk bantuan lebih lanjut dapat menghubungi Astari, Virtual Assistant kami di 08111027780 atau email ke customercarebcaf@bcaf.id.

Selamat menggunakan BCAF App.
item.update_notes:
Terimakasih telah menggunakan FinA BCA Finance.

Yang terbaru dari kami :
Fitur “Cari Mobil Bekas” menghadirkan Klik Garasi yang merupakan website terpercaya hasil kerjasama Garasi.id bersama dengan BCA Finance untuk jual beli mobil bekas dengan mobil berkualitas dari showroom rekanan BCA Finance. Temukan beragam mobil dari seluruh Indonesia dengan kredit mudah, cepat, dan bunga ringan dari BCA Finance.

Selamat menggunakan FinA BCA Finance, dan dapatkan kemudahannya.

item.title: Halo BCA
item.description:
It's time for a tour of the new haloBCA world! With the new look, enjoy these benefits below:

1. Easy Access with BCA ID
In the new world of haloBCA, you can already access haloBCA with the BCA ID that you already have.

Don’t have a BCA ID? You can register in this application. 

2. Using Biometric, Safer and More Convenient
After setting up your Biometric feature, just scan your face or fingerprint to get into haloBCA app.

3. Contact Customer Service Without Credit
You can contact our Customer Service with Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) credit-free call or simply through Halo BCA Chat.

4. Works Anywhere
haloBCA can be used anywhere in Indonesia and abroad as long as your phone is connected to an internet network.

5. Trustworthy Halo BCA Number & Account
No need to worry about fake Halo BCA contacts that are circulating and troubling. Access official BCA contacts through the Email and X (Twitter) menu.

6. Update Data Directly from the Application
You can update your data from a smartphone. Just access the "Akun Saya" menu from this application.

7. Check The Report Status
You can check your report status and handling time estimation from the apps. 

Check out more information at www.bca.co.id/halobca
Have a great tour inside the haloBCA world!
item.update_notes: Get the updated version of haloBCA Apps, you can check your report status and handling time estimation from the apps.

item.title: BCA mobile
item.description:
Bank on the go with BCA mobile app. Conduct non-cash transactions using BCA mobile banking (m-BCA) and BCA internet banking (KlikBCA Smartphone) whenever, wherever.

m-BCA Benefits
1. No SIM card changes
m-BCA transactions are available through all GSM operators, including Telkomsel, XL Axiata, Indosat, Axis, and Three
2. Low transactions cost 
Reduce unnecessary cost using GPRS/EDGE/3G/WIFI internet connection
3. Payment Data Storage
m-BCA’s storage feature enables you to conduct repeat transactions without having to input the data all over again
4. Transfer Data
m-BCA saves your transfer activities--whether you’re sending funds between BCA accounts or to other banks—to a list for a time-saving and reliable banking experience
5. Practical and Easy to Use
Recipient company or banking code is not required for payment and transfer transactions.

For BCA mobile users, can enjoy the latest services as follows:
1. Block BCA ATM Card or BCA Credit Card facility through m-Admin menu 
2. BCA Credit Card Activation feature through menu m-Admin ->Credit Card Activation
3. BCA Credit Card PIN Make / change facility via m-Admin menu ->Create / Change PIN.
4. Cardless Transaction feature through Setor Tarik menu ->Cash withdrawal and cash deposit. 
5. Transfer without hassle through QR menu ->Send or receive money using QR
For the time being, Cardless Transactions can be made at these following ATMs (www.bca.co.id/ATMtanpakartu)

KlikBCA 
Easy to access KlikBCA smartphone version smartphone https://m.klikbca.com with just one click

Info BCA 
https://www.bca.co.id/id/Individu/Produk/E-Banking/Info-BCA

Open New Account
Now you can open bank account anywhere just with your mobile phone. What you need to do to get your bank account is only by providing e-KTP, completing the form, and doing video call with our Customer Service Officer through BCA mobile application. After you done, you’ll get the success notification of your opening account; you might need to directly activate your mobile banking service (by creating PIN number for transaction) and deposit money to your account. Then you are ready to do any transaction with your BCA mobile application (m-BCA menu). You will also get KlikBCA account the day after you succeed creating your mobile banking PIN via email.

For further assistant, call halo bca at 1500888 via cellular phone

Enjoy using the BCA mobile.
item.update_notes:
The latest version of BCA mobile provides convenience and faster in transactions!

What are you waiting for, let's update BCA mobile now!
